`,(0,u.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,u.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`const fs = require("fs");\r
const [N, M] = fs.readFileSync("./input.txt").toString().split(" ").map(Number);\r
\r
let result = "";\r
function findCombination(arr) {\r
  // \uD6C4\uBCF4\uD574\uAC00 \uD574\uACB0\uCC45\uC778\uC9C0 \uD655\uC778\r
  if (arr.length === M) {\r
    result += arr.join(" ") + "\\n"; // \uD604\uC7AC \uC870\uD569\uC744 \uACB0\uACFC\uC5D0 \uCD94\uAC00\r
    return; // \uAC00\uC9C0\uCE58\uAE30: M\uAC1C\uAC00 \uB118\uB294 \uC870\uD569\uC740 \uD544\uC694\uC5C6\uB2E4!\r
  }\r
\r
  // \uC7AC\uADC0\uC801\uC73C\uB85C \uD6C4\uBCF4\uAD70\uC744 \uD0D0\uC0C9\r
  for (let i = 1; i <= N; i++) {\r
    if (!arr.includes(i)) {\r
      arr.push(i);\r
      findCombination(arr);\r
      arr.pop(); // \uBC31\uD2B8\uB798\uD0B9: \uC774\uC804 \uB2E8\uACC4\uB85C \uB418\uB3CC\uC544\uAC00\uACE0 \uB2E4\uB978 \uD6C4\uBCF4 \uCC3E\uAE30\r
    }\r
  }\r
}\r
findCombination([], 1);\r
\r
console.log(result);
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\SSAFY\\haeun\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2448b8bd-8fbf-4f3f-bf7b-1abc076f686a.mdx",lineNumber:44,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\SSAFY\\haeun\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2448b8bd-8fbf-4f3f-bf7b-1abc076f686a.mdx",lineNumber:44,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\SSAFY\\haeun\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2448b8bd-8fbf-4f3f-bf7b-1abc076f686a.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:1},this)}function pr(l={}){let{wrapper:t}=l.components||{};return t?(0,u.jsxDEV)(t,Object.assign({},l,{children:(0,u.jsxDEV)(Te,l,void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\SSAFY\\haeun\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2448b8bd-8fbf-4f3f-bf7b-1abc076f686a.mdx"},this)}),void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\SSAFY\\haeun\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2448b8bd-8fbf-4f3f-bf7b-1abc076f686a.mdx"},this):Te(l)}var _r=pr;return hr(gr);})();
